example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 但)) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 提起) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHPP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TMP (NT 当年)) (NP-SBJ (NN 大寨人)) (VP (PP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-1)) (ADVP (AD 艰苦)) (VP (VV 创业)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 精神))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (PN 他们)) (VP (ADVP (AD 还是)) (PP-DIR (P 打) (LCP (NP (NN 心眼)) (LC 里))) (VP (VV 佩服))))
example.arg: *PRO* 提起 *OP* 当年 大寨人 *T*-1 艰苦 创业 的 精神
